<denchmark-h:h5>Claudio Caraffi on 2015-01-20 16:57</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>It seems it's a bug of MinGW. http://stackoverflow.com/a/28050492/2436175
For those interested, a workaround is, of course, suppressing the warning:
commenting: add_extra_compiler_option(-Werror=non-virtual-dtor) in: /cmake/OpenCVCompilerOptions.cmake
Modifying CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS does not really help as they are applied in the command line before the .cmake file compiler options (which therefore prevail). - Status changed from Done to Cancelled </denchmark-code>
